sentences.english: Power law probability distributions of multiscale auroral dynamics from ground - based TV observations.
sentences.chinese: 根据陆基TV观测多尺度极光动力学的幂律概率分布。

sentences.english: A small mobile missile can help make America's land-based arsenal more secure .
sentences.chinese: 小型机动式导弹会有助于使美国的陆基武库转为安全。

sentences.english: At the same time there will be launches from strategic missile complexes based on land.
sentences.chinese: 同时也将进行陆基战略导弹的合成发射。

sentences.english: France dismantled its land-based nuclear weapons in 1996.
sentences.chinese: 1996年，法国除役全部陆基核武器。

sentences.english: The 2nd Artillery Corps of the People's Liberation Army controls China's land-based missile forces.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民解放军第二炮兵控制着中国的陆基导弹力量。

sentences.english: In some land-based casinos, there are three player hands for every dealer hand.
sentences.chinese: 在一些陆基赌场，有三个球员的手，每手交易。

sentences.english: But the basic land based models can only hit North American targets west of the Rocky mountains.
sentences.chinese: 但是基本陆基型只能打击洛矶山脉西面的北美目标。

sentences.english: The warheads in storage can be carried via aircraft or land-based missiles.
sentences.chinese: 在存弹头可装备于空基飞机或陆基导弹。

sentences.english: A small mobile missile can help make America's land-based arsenal more secure.
sentences.chinese: 小型机动式导弹会有助于使美国的陆基武库转为安全。

definition: anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)

pinyin: zhou1 ji4 dan4 dao4 dao3 dan4

definition: early warning aircraft system, e.g. US AWACS
